company.name: VC999 Packaging Systems
company.description:
Automated packaging systems and advanced packaging materials for the food industry.
Innovative Products for the Packaging Industry

VC999 Packaging Systems is a global leader in the design and manufacturing of Vacuum Chamber Machines, Horizontal Thermoforming (rollstock) Form-Fill-Seal Packaging Machines, Tray Sealer, and Skin Packaging, as well as other ancillary items, packaging materials/supplies, and full line components from our sister brands XtraVac and XtraPlast, such as Vertical & Horizontal Flow Wrapping Machine Systems, Packaging Robotics, Vision Inspection Systems, Conveyer/Converger Systems, Weighing, Labeling, and Product Scanning. Our dedicated and highly experienced team of packaging consultants can assist you in the designing the Right Machine Systems for your Packaging Operations and the Perfect Product Package for Your Customers.

The VC999 team is strategically located around the world, allowing the ability to quickly respond to your needs. We invite you to contact a packaging consultant today to learn how we can help your business.

A Brief History

VC999 Packaging Systems was founded almost a half-century ago by Bernhard Inauen. The company remains, today, family owned and headquartered in Herisau, Switzerland and Recognized around the world for their engineering design and manufacturing expertise in all aspects of packaging machine systems.
The continued growth and expansion of VC999 throughout Europe, Asia and Africa into the west includes manufacturing in Kansas City, Missouri and offices throughout North, Central & South America. This US facility designs and manufactures Thermoformer machines systems and manages the company's sister brands, XtraPlast Packaging Materials & XtraVac Packaging Machines.
